alert.note: Alert for Cowlitz (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 06 at 3:08PM PST until December 07 at 1:21AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Washington... Cowlitz River at Kelso affecting Cowlitz County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Oregon...Washington... Wilson River near Tillamook affecting Tillamook County. Siletz River at Siletz affecting Lincoln County. Grays River at Covered Bridge near Rosburg affecting Wahkiakum County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cowlitz River at Kelso. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...Above 21.5 feet, flooding of several low lying and secondary roads begins, including the Cowlitz Gardens neighborhood, along with flooding of pasture and lowland upstream of Kelso. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:36 PM PST Wednesday the stage was 21.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 18.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:36 PM PST Wednesday was 22.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate above flood stage with a maximum value of 21.8 feet late this afternoon. It will fall below flood stage around 10 PM this evening. - Flood stage is 21.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 415 PM PST.
